OCD.name: Platform UI Configuration
OCD.description: Global User Interface configurations used across the applications. Contains configuration for banners and other generic ui components.

AD.description: Turns on a system usage message, which is shown when the Search Application is opened
AD.name: Enable System Usage Message

AD.description: A title for the system usage Message when the application is opened
AD.name: System Usage Message Title

AD.description: A system usage message to be displayed to the user each time the user opens the application
AD.name: System Usage Message

AD.description: With this selected, the system usage message will be shown once for each browser session. Uncheck this to have the usage message appear every time the search window is opened or refreshed.
AD.name: Show System Usage Message once per session

AD.description: Specifies the header text to be rendered on all pages.
AD.name: Header

AD.description: Specifies the footer text to be rendered on all pages.
AD.name: Footer

AD.description: Specifies the Text Color of the Header and Footer. Use html css colors or #rrggbb.
AD.name: Text Color

AD.description: Specifies the Background Color of the Header and Footer. Use html css colors or #rrggbb.
AD.name: Background Color
